DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe, Oceania and the United States of America (USA). The aim of this trial is to compare two NN1250 (insulin degludec) formulations with each other and with insulin glargine, all in combination with insulin aspart in subjects with type 1 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two NN1250 Formulations Versus Insulin Glargine, All in Combination With Insulin Aspart in Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes for at least one year HbA1c 711% (both inclusive) Treated with insulin for at least six months any regimen Any systemic treatment with products which in the Investigator's opinion could interfere with glucose or lipid metabolism (eg systemic corticosteroids) 3 months prior to randomisation Subject has a clinically significant, active (during the past 12 months) disease of the gastrointestinal, pulmonary, neurological, genitourinary, or haematological system that, in the opinion of the Investigator, may confound the results of the trial or pose additional risk in administering trial product
